Cherry Sparkles

Cherry Sparkles shimmers with a warm, nostalgic lo-fi essence. Faded synthwave textures float over a bed of mellow drums and soft tape hiss, evoking cozy memories and late-night reflections. A dreamy sonic daydream best enjoyed in slow motion.

  • Album: Stranger Vibes
  • Genre: lo-fi
  • Mood: Melancholy , Dreamy , Nostalgic
  • Duration: 2:00
